attributes.action: Vote of no confidence in our Prime Minister
attributes.additional_details: Deliver a vote of no confidence on the current serving Prime Minister
attributes.background: Listen to the people of the UK who are sick of the lying of our government and contempt they have shown to people, who suffered great hardship during Covid lockdowns

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for MPs or Ministers to be sacked or for them to resign.
